video.title: The Good Bandit
video.synopsis: A near-death experience spurs a feared drug lord to leave behind his life of crime and infidelity, to the disbelief of everyone close to him.

episodes.synopsis: While serving time prison for murder, drug lord Emilio Ortega suffers an unlikely accident that brings him face to face with his favorite patron saint.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Freed from prison, Ortega struggles to stick to his promises, especially after discovering his money stash was stolen. Natalia refuses to be ignored.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: After selling their house to pay off debts, the Ortegas move to a new home, which horrifies son Dylan. Ortega envisions a new kind of business empire.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Ortega tasks Jopini with recruiting a new type of army. Detective Ramírez records Ortega ordering a suspicious-sounding substance over the phone.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: When Ramírez is dealt a harsh blow by his boss, his new partner takes action. Natalia devises a way to get what's hers, but it will require Mile's help.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: When Ortega expresses regrets about signing the proxy, Natalia enlists Horacio to help her proceed anyway. Dylan tries to impress the opposite sex.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Dylan starts at a private school -- in the eighth grade. When Natalia shows up drunk at the restaurant, Ortega must get rid of her before Mile sees her.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The party at the restaurant spirals out of control after Dylan brings his entire class and Horacio invites Ortega's former business associates.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: To get her son out of jail, Mile calls Natalia for help. In the wake of the party, Ortega faces its consequences on the restaurant and his marriage.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Pamela tries to win back Ortega with a serenade outside his home. A classmate's challenge spurs Dylan to gather proof of his "relationship" with Pamela.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: A threat makes Ortega realize he must set firm boundaries with Pamela, so he confronts her at a concert rehearsal, unaware that Dylan is very close by.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Right before the vow-renewal ceremony, Mile borrows Dylan's phone and stumbles upon an unpleasant surprise.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Natalia receives an unexpected visit from Mile, who stuns her with a request. While Pichuchas makes progress with Jopini, Ortega is ambushed by a mob.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: When Ortega learns that a customer at Francy's salon has taken a special interest in Mile, he tries to spy on them to see how worried he should be.
episodes.title: Episode 14

episodes.synopsis: Pichuchas is tasked with spying on Mile, who receives a mysterious envelope from Raúl. Ortega attends a job interview that includes a polygraph test.
episodes.title: Episode 15

episodes.synopsis: To prove his innocence, Ortega drags Mile to Pamela's home. Ramírez and Martínez's pursuit of Ortega leads them to an even bigger fish.
episodes.title: Episode 16

episodes.synopsis: Natalia seeks a psychologist's help. The police bring Ortega in for questioning. Ramírez's eyes are finally opened to Martínez's feelings for him.
episodes.title: Episode 17

episodes.synopsis: Two sisters plan to spring a big surprise on Ortega. After suffering another head injury, Ortega again sees a vision, but it's not of St. Jude Thaddeus.
episodes.title: Episode 18

episodes.synopsis: Natalia meets the child reported to be Ortega's illegitimate son. Ortega has his first day of work at his new job. Doña Raquel suffers a scare.
episodes.title: Episode 19

episodes.synopsis: Natalia arranges for Ortega and Sandra to meet face to face. In an attempt to impress classmate Tuto, Dylan agrees to an unwise deal.
episodes.title: Episode 20

episodes.synopsis: Detective Ramírez sets his sights on a new target: Dylan. Ortega meets Brayan Emilio, and Natalia receives their DNA test results.
episodes.title: Episode 21

episodes.synopsis: Detective Ramírez stops and searches Tuto, and brings him in for questioning. Ortega tries to work up the courage to tell his wife about Brayan Emilio.
episodes.title: Episode 22

episodes.synopsis: When Ortega finds Dylan at the party venue, Ramírez confronts them both and demands to search the backpack. Vero conspires behind her sister's back.
episodes.title: Episode 23

episodes.synopsis: Sensing something is off with her husband, Mile follows him. Sandra presents a new list of demands to Ortega. The police pressure Tuto to meet Ortega.
episodes.title: Episode 24

episodes.synopsis: Francy tries to cheer up Mile with a wild girls night out, but later receives bad news of her own. Andrés offers Ortega a lucrative government contract.
episodes.title: Episode 25

episodes.synopsis: Jopini finds herself being followed. Tuto pays Dylan a visit in order to spy on Ortega, whom he overhears discussing a new business venture.
episodes.title: Episode 26

episodes.synopsis: When a loan shark ransacks Sandra's home and threatens to return, Ortega comes to the rescue. To find Jopini, Pichuchas appeals to St. Jude Thaddeus.
episodes.title: Episode 27

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos's thugs capture video of Jopini canoodling with Pichuchas, and show it to their boss. Tuto overhears Ortega discussing a new operation.
episodes.title: Episode 28

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos's thugs finally spot Pichuchas on his own and make their move. Andrés gives Ortega cash for lunch supplies, revealing what the catch is.
episodes.title: Episode 29

episodes.synopsis: After learning why Pichuchas was ambushed, Ortega arranges a risky meeting with Juan Carlos. When Mile finds out, she gives Juan Carlos's wife a call.
episodes.title: Episode 30

episodes.synopsis: Juan Carlos is confronted by his wife and her brothers. Carepuño seeks help from one of his contacts to get lower-priced lunch ingredients for Ortega.
episodes.title: Episode 31

episodes.synopsis: Everyone at El Marrano pitches in to make the school lunches for their first delivery. After convincing Ortega to give him a job, Tuto plants a bug.
episodes.title: Episode 32

episodes.synopsis: Andrés receives an insider's tip about Ortega. Mile makes a sacrifice to pay off a debt. Ortega becomes suspicious of Tuto and forces him to talk.
episodes.title: Episode 33

episodes.synopsis: Preparing to register her son's birth and tell him who his father is, Sandra visits the hospital to get a copy of the paternity test results.
episodes.title: Episode 34

episodes.synopsis: A drunken Ramírez focuses all his anger on Ortega and decides to get his own form of justice. Pichuchas catches Carepuño heading down a dangerous path.
episodes.title: Episode 35

episodes.synopsis: Detective Martínez visits Ortega and begs him for a favor. Carepuño is sent to a detention center, where he runs into a familiar face.
episodes.title: Episode 36

episodes.synopsis: Ortega makes a deal with prison-yard leader Patas. Mile and Francy have an unpleasant encounter with the gang that has taken over the local park.
episodes.title: Episode 37

episodes.synopsis: Family and friends start spreading the word around town that Ortega is running for city council. Yadiz wastes no time in trying to seduce Ortega.
episodes.title: Episode 38

episodes.synopsis: A suspicious Mile and Francy spy on Ortega's meeting with Yadiz, who moves on to a second target: Horacio. Election day arrives and the polls open.
episodes.title: Episode 39

episodes.synopsis: When Ortega finds out what his rival in the election is doing to get more votes, he is forced to come up with a voter incentive of his own.
episodes.title: Episode 40

episodes.synopsis: Detective Martínez returns home and faces her disapproving mother. Tensions run high as the election results start to come in.
episodes.title: Episode 41

episodes.synopsis: Yadiz delivers an ultimatum to Ortega. Pichuchas is unable to hide Jopini from his mother, who demands to speak to her woman-to-woman.
episodes.title: Episode 42

episodes.synopsis: Perea reports the return of Raigozo to Col. Daza, whose response alarms Perea. Yadiz devises a plan to sway Ortega's vote in the mayoral election.
episodes.title: Episode 43

episodes.synopsis: During the mayoral vote, Ortega is forced to choose between doing the right thing and protecting his wife from learning the truth about Natalia.
episodes.title: Episode 44

episodes.synopsis: At the gym, Valeria steps up her flirtations with Pichuchas. Raigozo's son enlists a mole to dig up dirt on Ortega, and pays a visit to Horacio.
episodes.title: Episode 45

episodes.synopsis: Ortega finally comes clean to his wife about Natalia. On a phone tap, Perea overhears a suspicious conversation between Raigozo and Col. Daza's lawyer.
episodes.title: Episode 46

episodes.synopsis: Ortega sees Natalia in the church and explodes. Mile and her daughter find a place to stay. Daza summons Detectives Martínez and Perea to his office.
episodes.title: Episode 47

episodes.synopsis: Ramírez goes undercover to protect someone close to him. When Daza learns Ortega won't cooperate with the Raigozos, he takes matters into his own hands.
episodes.title: Episode 48

episodes.synopsis: Pichuchas is captured in a misleading photo. Daza reinstates Ramírez, who is ordered to make Ortega talk. Dylan questions why his dad got a new lawyer.
episodes.title: Episode 49

episodes.synopsis: Pichuchas seeks Ortega's advice regarding the blackmail photo. Ortega and Horacio are abducted and brought to Raigozo Sr. Jopini misinterprets a scene.
episodes.title: Episode 50

episodes.synopsis: An attempt to dissuade Raigozo Jr. from sending the blackmail photo to Jopini backfires. Ortega tries to figure out who stole the Raigozos' money.
episodes.title: Episode 51

episodes.synopsis: To confirm his suspicions about who stole the money, Ortega pays a visit to an old associate, Fat Mauro. Dylan makes an alarming announcement to Mile.
episodes.title: Episode 52

episodes.synopsis: Raigozo Jr. sabotages Ortega's car in an attempt to scare him into cooperating. While researching his new crush, Natalia, Daza learns about her past.
episodes.title: Episode 53

episodes.synopsis: Armed with his newly discovered information about Natalia, Daza offers her a deal. Detective Martínez plans a surprise for Ramírez.
episodes.title: Episode 54

episodes.synopsis: Ramírez's daughter proposes an idea that catches Martínez off guard. To increase the pressure on Ortega, the Raimozos target his family members.
episodes.title: Episode 55

episodes.synopsis: Sensing something isn't right about the way his deal with the police is being handled, Ortega calls Martínez and asks to meet with her in secret.
episodes.title: Episode 56

episodes.synopsis: Daza is told of Ortega's new terms. To make his plan work, Ortega plays along with Natalia's delusion that she's his partner in business -- and love.
episodes.title: Episode 57

episodes.synopsis: Martínez asks Ramírez and her aunt for help with her sting operation. Ortega sets a meeting with the Raigozos, but insists it be held at El Marrano.
episodes.title: Episode 58

episodes.synopsis: Dylan and Laura become close. Pichuchas finds a surprise waiting for him at home. Ortega must get Natalia out of the way without making her angry.
episodes.title: Episode 59

episodes.synopsis: Ramírez suspects his daughter is hiding something from him and follows her. Daza grows wary when he learns Ortega is meeting regularly with a nun.
episodes.title: Episode 60

episodes.synopsis: Just as the sting operation gets underway, Daza is shown a close-up of the nun's face. Ortega tries to dissuade Natalia from accompanying him.
episodes.title: Episode 61

episodes.synopsis: Daza takes advantage of Natalia's desperate situation. Mile receives a startling request from her daughter. Doña Raquel is given some medical advice.
episodes.title: Episode 62

episodes.synopsis: Ortega attends Pichuchas and Jopini's big event, unaware that Daza has put a target on his back. The judge gives his ruling on Natalia's court case.
episodes.title: Episode 63
